summary: When the user asks 'Can I save $500 a month and still meet my financial goals?', route to finance_agent and goal_agent. Rationale: Analyzing the feasibility of savings goals and assessing overall financial health.

When the user says 'I want to increase my savings goal, but I'm not sure if I can afford it right now.', route to goal_agent and finance_agent. Rationale: Goal adjustment request with financial capacity evaluation.
When the user asks 'If I start saving for a car, how will that affect my monthly budget?', route to goal_agent and finance_agent. Rationale: New savings goal creation with budget impact analysis.
